# 53 张设计师口袋心理学 v1.1 20210602

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/x53-zhang-shejishi-koudai-xinlixue-v1-1-20210602
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/x53-zhang-shejishi-koudai-xinlixue-v1-1-20210602
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install x53-zhang-shejishi-koudai-xinlixue-v1-1-20210602
x53-zhang-shejishi-koudai-xinlixue-v1-1-20210602 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xwusan-zhang-shejishi-koudai-xinlixue-v1-1-erlingeryilingliulinger
xwusan-zhang-shejishi-koudai-xinlixue-v1-1-erlingeryilingliulinger <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
